3925713 3927924 that no dream could be too big.

3929967 3932803 With the help and support

3932887 3935640 and from all of our donors

3937808 3941562 to reach more families

3947109 3951489 are able to make

4633211 4636840 to look like people.

4636923 4639760 But only the person that's

4639843 4642929 No, that's-- that's not real.

4653649 4655442 I don't know.

4655525 4657778 I feel like I'm losing

4660072 4662407 while it was latched onto him.

4662491 4664368 that infects the host

4664451 4667120 In less than a week,

4667204 4669873 It's like it feeds off
